secret_rule: Only items that are mentioned or referenced in a critically acclaimed graphic novel can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "Watchmen" and "The Sandman" and "Maus".

Correct! The rule is: Only items that are mentioned or referenced in a critically acclaimed graphic novel can be brought to the picnic.
